entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
